_sText:
Breakceiling is a little homage to Tstar and his map Breakfloor. I hope you enjoy it as much as you would breakfloor. This is also dedicated to the Wildfire Clan and their love for break maps. To go to our site, go to www.wildfireclan.co.uk. Don't forget to leave us your comments in the forums!

The Teleport opens after 40 seconds into the round to stop people fom rushing the top. The teleport and the water are to prevent Team Killing, which is a major problem in Breakfloor.

Comments, suggestions or ideas? My xfire is hedbanger999, AIM - Trancem1ssion, MSN - hedbanger999@hotmail.com

Thank You again,
[Wildfire] Hawk


Version History and Bug Fixes:
Version 1 -
- Initial Stage

Version 2 -
- Added a Teleport to the top.
- Fixed height of walkway to the top.
- Added boxes in the spawn.

Version 3
- Fixed CT side glitch. Once able to walk on a small ledge on the outside.
- Place teleport in different are to avoid people being stuck in one another.
- Teleport in now able to be used in 40 seconds instead of 60. 60 was too long.
- Fixed problem with players shooting through the spawn walls.
